articles.title: France's Emmanuel Macron Wins Second Term, Defeats Far-Right Leader - NDTV
articles.description: French President Emmanuel Macron on Sunday defeated his rival Marine Le Pen in presidential elections, projections showed, prompting a wave of relief in Europe that the far-right had been prevented from taking power.
articles.content:
Emmanuel Macron is the first French president to win re-election since Jacques Chirac in 2002.
